SELECT t.id as id, t.name as name, t.start_date as startDate, t.end_date as endDate, tc.id as statusId, tc.name as statusName , t.created_by as createdBy, t.created_date as createdDate, t.last_modified_by as lastModifiedBy, t.last_modified_date as lastModifiedDate , CASE WHEN (SELECT count(taf.task_id) FROM owl_task_attached_file taf WHERE taf.task_id = t.id) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END as attachedFileExistYn , CASE WHEN t.private_yn = 'Y' THEN true WHEN t.private_yn = 'N' THEN false END as privateYn , CASE WHEN t.template_yn = 'Y' THEN true WHEN t.template_yn = 'N' THEN false END as templateYn , CASE WHEN t.important_yn = 'Y' THEN true WHEN t.important_yn = 'N' THEN false END as importantYn , tp.id as projectId, tp.name as projectName , CASE WHEN tp.folder_yn = 'Y' THEN true WHEN tp.folder_yn = 'N' THEN false END as projectFolderYn , t.parent_id as parentId , trs.repeat_type as repeatType FROM (
SELECT CASE WHEN to_char(now(), 'YYYY-MM-DD') > it.end_date THEN 9 WHEN to_char(now(), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = it.end_date THEN 8 ELSE 1 END as orderTarget ,it.* FROM owl_task it WHERE it.end_date != '' AND to_char(now(), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= it.start_date AND it.status_id = 1 AND (created_by = #{userId} OR EXISTS (SELECT tu.id FROM owl_task_user tu LEFT JOIN owl_user tiu ON tu.user_id = tiu.id WHERE tu.task_id = it.id AND tiu.login = #{userId} ) )
ORDER BY orderTarget DESC, it.end_date ASC, it.start_date ASC, it.name ASC
SELECT CASE WHEN it.start_date != '' THEN 9 ELSE 1 END as orderTarget ,it.* FROM owl_task it WHERE (to_char(now(), 'YYYY-MM-DD') < it.start_date OR (it.start_date = '' AND it.end_date = '')) AND it.status_id = 1 AND (created_by = #{userId} OR EXISTS (SELECT tu.id FROM owl_task_user tu LEFT JOIN owl_user tiu ON tu.user_id = tiu.id WHERE tu.task_id = it.id AND tiu.login = #{userId} ) )
ORDER BY orderTarget DESC, it.start_date ASC, it.created_date ASC, it.name ASC
SELECT 1 as orderTarget ,it.* FROM owl_task it WHERE it.status_id = 3 AND (created_by = #{userId} OR EXISTS (SELECT tu.id FROM owl_task_user tu LEFT JOIN owl_user tiu ON tu.user_id = tiu.id WHERE tu.task_id = it.id AND tiu.login = #{userId} ) )
ORDER BY orderTarget DESC, it.end_date ASC, it.start_date ASC, it.name ASC
SELECT 1 as orderTarget ,it.* FROM owl_task it WHERE it.status_id = 2 AND (created_by = #{userId} OR EXISTS (SELECT tu.id FROM owl_task_user tu LEFT JOIN owl_user tiu ON tu.user_id = tiu.id WHERE tu.task_id = it.id AND tiu.login = #{userId} ) )
ORDER BY orderTarget DESC, it.end_date DESC, it.name ASC

mapper.select: SELECT (c.assignedCount + c.createdCount + c.watchedCount) as totalCount, c.assignedCount, c.createdCount, c.watchedCount FROM (SELECT (SELECT COUNT(t.id) FROM () t WHERE t.id IN (SELECT tu.task_id FROM owl_task_user tu LEFT JOIN owl_user u ON tu.user_id = u.id WHERE tu.user_type = 'ASSIGNEE' AND u.login = #{userId}) ) as assignedCount , (SELECT COUNT(t.id) FROM () t WHERE NOT t.id IN (SELECT tu.task_id FROM owl_task_user tu LEFT JOIN owl_user u ON tu.user_id = u.id WHERE tu.user_type = 'ASSIGNEE' AND u.login = #{userId}) AND t.created_by = #{userId} ) as createdCount ,(SELECT COUNT(t.id) FROM () t WHERE NOT t.id IN (SELECT tu.task_id FROM owl_task_user tu LEFT JOIN owl_user u ON tu.user_id = u.id WHERE tu.user_type = 'ASSIGNEE' AND u.login = #{userId}) AND t.id IN (SELECT tu.task_id FROM owl_task_user tu LEFT JOIN owl_user u ON tu.user_id = u.id WHERE tu.user_type = 'WATCHER' AND u.login = #{userId}) AND t.created_by != #{userId} ) as watchedCount) c
